type: Legendary Creature – Human Pegasus Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
[i]On Wings We Fly[/i] – When Caeda, First to Fly enters, create X 2/2 white Pegasus Knight creature tokens with flying.
[i]Skydrake Whip[/i] – Whenever a nontoken creature you control with flying enters, if it has [i]Promote[/i], you may transform them.
